name: MiniGolf (itch) (danqua)
description:
This is the first game I ever made. It is simple, yet a little fun to play, since you can draw your own maps in paint!

The color values are:

Player: RGB(255, 0, 0)
Hole: RGB(0, 255, 0)
Wall: RGB(0, 0, 255)

I might add some more features, but for now I'm just happy that I finished a small game and want to start the next one :P
